turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i assist you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I get an iced latte macchiato from Starbuks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want a caramel macchiato from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, an iced latte macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you have a milk preference?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: o.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: k.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: then.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good joke.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one from Route 40 in Columbia, Maryland, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: alright a tall iced latte macchiato with whole milk from starbucks on route 40 in maryland will be $4.50.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please place the order now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great the order will be ready in 10 minutes for pick up. and the receipt has been sent to your phone.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. No, I am good. Thank you very much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great bye.
